TupletNumberInterface¶

class abjad.tuplet.number.TupletNumberInterface(client)¶

Bases: abjad.core.interface._Interface, abjad.core.grobhandler._GrobHandler

Handle LilyPond TupletNumber grob.

abjad> t = Staff(construct.scale(4))
abjad> t.tupletnumber.transparent = True
abjad> print t.format
\new Staff \with {
   \override TupletNumber #'transparent = ##t
} {
   c'8
   d'8
   e'8
   f'8
}
